citations.narrative:
Multiple enclosures were identified with an accumulation of organic material, excreta and debris. This was noted
particularly in the corner areas. Excessive amounts of debris build up could harbor bacteria and could cause illness to the
animals. Enclosures must be cleaned and sanitized as often as necessary to prevent an accumulation of excreta or
debris. The facility is in the process of refining sanitation protocols in order to address this issue.
******Correct by 11/26/25
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives.
n

narrative:
3.31(a)(1) 
   
Sanitation. 
Multiple enclosures were identified with an accumulation of organic material, excreta and debris. This was noted 
particularly in the corner areas. Excessive amounts of debris build up could harbor bacteria and could cause illness to the 
animals. Enclosures must be cleaned and sanitized as often as necessary to prevent an accumulation of excreta or 
debris. The facility is in the process of refining sanitation protocols in order to address this issue.  
******Correct by 11/26/25 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives.
